supplies.name: Hay
supplies.description: Dried grass used as animal food.

supplies.name: Shears
supplies.description: Use this to collect wool from sheep

livestock.name: Chicken
livestock.description: Well cared-for chickens lay eggs every day. Lives in the coop.

livestock.name: Cow
livestock.description: Can be milked daily. A milk pail is required to harvest the milk. Lives in the barn.

livestock.name: Goat
livestock.description: Happy provide goat milk every other day. A milk pail is required to harvest the milk. Lives in the barn.

livestock.name: Duck
livestock.description: Happy lay duck eggs every other day. Lives in the coop.

livestock.name: Sheep
livestock.description: Can be shorn for wool. A pair of shears is required to harvest the wool. Lives in the barn.

livestock.name: Rabbit
livestock.description: These are wooly rabbits! They shed precious wool every few days. Lives in the coop.

livestock.name: Dinosaur
livestock.description: The Dinosaur is a farm animal that lives in a Big Coop

livestock.name: Pig
livestock.description: These pigs are trained to find truffles! Lives in the barn.
